name: DR Model-XJ3 Repeater
description:
Manufacturer: Associated Science & Development
Item Type: Distortion Repeater
Size: 3
Shutdown hostile actions and target power supplies with the DR Model-XJ3, a well-ranged distortion repeater developed by the advanced weapons research labs of ASD.
description_cn:
制造商：联合科学与开发公司(Associated Science & Development)
物品类型：扭曲速射炮
尺寸：3
来自ASD实验室的 ASDDR Model-XJ3作为一种具有优良射程武器，能够切断目标的电量供给并且令其无法行动.
